_sText: aim_ag_texture_city_3k 2nd version of aim_ag_texture_city_2k and a remake of aim_ag_texture_city (by MohaX) The map maintains the basic layout of aim_ag_texture_city, however with many more ways (bridges) and many more ladders (ropes), which allow to come from behind. In my opinion a big issue of the original map is that 2 persons left at the end of a round will merely find each other. To avoid such situations I created the map much more open. Changelog: - City surrounding - Lightning overworked - Wider alleys - Moved "CT-Ladder"(leading to the roof of hallway) to the right - 48 Spawnpoints - It's possible to jumb from the 2 palms to the ropes of the high CT-building and the T-building - Textures changed - More minor changes More Screenshots in 1600*900
